data.name: Computational Science for Real-time COVID-19 Response
data.summary: In this talk, Prof. will describe the group's work developing scalable and pervasive computing based concepts, theories and tools for planning, forecasting and response in the event of epidemics. He will draw on the work in supporting analysts and policy makers as they plan and respond to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic. Prof. Marathe will end the talk by outlining directions for future work.
